title: At Home
description: Improve your Japanese speaking skills with phrases typically used at home. Focus on clear pronunciation and appropriate intonation.
instructions: Below is a list of phrases you might use at home in Japanese.
Aim for clear and natural pronunciation.
Maintain a conversational and steady pace.
After recording, listen to your playback and compare it to the text.
Pay attention to intonation, clarity, and fluency in Japanese.
Repeat the recording process as necessary to improve your Japanese speaking skills.
